bibl.title: Varius coloribus Apis. Some Remarks on the Colours of Apis and Other Sacred Animals.
bibl.note: The symbolic meaning of Apis' colours.

bibl.title: Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I

bibl.seg: VOS René L., Varius coloribus Apis. Some Remarks on the Colours of Apis and Other Sacred Animals.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 709-718.
The symbolic meaning of Apis' colours.
